quote: And anyway, the anticipation was always worse than the thing itself - the anticipation and the memory, of course. And the anticipation of the memory was maybe the worst part of all.
quote_letters: AND ANYWAY THE ANTICIPATION WAS ALWAYS WORSE THAN THE THING ITSELF - THE ANTICIPATION AND THE MEMORY OF COURSE AND THE ANTICIPATION OF THE MEMORY WAS MAYBE THE WORST PART OF ALL
